title: Can I make dua in sujood & make dua in my own language in any prayer sunnah or fard
transcript: yes can i make it in or only involuntary you can make it in ford and voluntary or any type of of sujud can i make it in my own native language if you don't know how to ask allah in arabic this specific thing oh allah make this pen a running uh smoothly in my test i don't know how to say it in arabic you can say it in your native language without any problem and allah azza knows best you
